mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT amt FROM lecture WHERE lno = #{lno}) - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payment WHERE lno = #{lno});
mapper.insert: insert into lecture (cate, title, content, price, bcode,tcode, status, sdate,edate, tdate,amt) values(#{cate},#{title},#{content},#{price},#{bcode},#{tcode},#{status},#{sdate},#{edate},#{tdate},#{amt})
